title: Crew Show: Z06 Review; Huge M3 Repair Bill; Q&A
description:
Matt tells us alllll about the new Z06; Zack found not-fun surprises underneath his M3; the 135i is heading out for some MAJOR installs; our DBX 707 review goes up; and Matt is back from the big test that is Road & Track's Performance Car of the Year ("PCOTY").  
 

Plus we answer questions about the best road trip sedan to replace a BMW 320i; the most engaging 2+2 for $90k; and what to do if you can't park your track car outside.
 

 Recorded October 3, 2022

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire65 and use code smokingtire65 for 65% off plus free shipping!
